attributes.action: No current MP should be allowed to stand at the next General Election.
attributes.additional_details: No matter on which side of the Brexit debate we sit, we have become frustrated with tribal MPs who do not listen and put the interests of their party before the interests of the Nation. We must take back control from MPs who, ten years after the expenses scandal, still do not think themselves accountable to the Electorate, but continue to feed from the silver pig trough and continue to serve their Leaders and careers. Enough! We need new blood and a new beginning in Westminster.
attributes.background: Drain the swamp that is Westminster. Time for a new start! Let us flush the system completely. No current (as of 29 March 2019) sitting MP at Westminster should be allowed to stand at the next General Election.
